history.proof: split. - intros H. shelve. - intros (b & pf & H). exact.

exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable x.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
server: nid
clients: seq nid
Hnin: is_true (server \notin clients)
Huniq: is_true (uniq clients)
the_tag: nat
prec: nid -> seq nat -> Prop
prec_safe: forall (this to : nat_eqType) (m : seq nat), HClient this to -> prec to m -> msg_from_client {| tag := the_tag; tms_cont := m |}
to: nid
this: nid
d: dstatelet
msg: seq nat

Goal:
client_send_safe this to d msg <-> (exists (b : heap) (pf : client_send_safe this to d msg), client_step pf = Some b)

Premises:
is_true = eq^~ true : bool -> Prop Arguments is_true _%bool_scope is_true is a coercion
client_step : forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), client_send_safe this to d msg -> option heap
tag = fun t : TaggedMessage => let (tag, _) := t in tag : TaggedMessage -> nat
Record dstatelet : Type := DStatelet { dstate : lstate_type heap; dsoup : soup }
Some : ?A -> option ?A where ?A : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat prec : nid -> seq nat -> Prop prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (m : seq nat), HClient this to -> prec to m -> msg_from_client {| tag := the_tag; tms_cont := m |} this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet msg : seq nat |- Type]
nat_eqType = EqType nat nat_eqMixin : eqType
client_send_safe = fun (this n : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat) => [/\ HClient this n, coh d & prec n msg] : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop Arguments client_send_safe _ _ _ _%seq_scope
msg_from_client = fun ms : TaggedMessage => tag ms == update_tag /\ (exists e v : nat, ms = [:: e; v]) \/ tag ms == read_tag /\ (exists e : nat, ms = [:: e]) : TaggedMessage -> Prop
uniq : seq ?T -> bool where ?T : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat prec : nid -> seq nat -> Prop prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (m : seq nat), HClient this to -> prec to m -> msg_from_client {| tag := the_tag; tms_cont := m |} this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet msg : seq nat |- eqType]
tms_cont = fun t : TaggedMessage => let (_, tms_cont) := t in tms_cont : TaggedMessage -> seq nat tms_cont is a coercion
nid = nat : Set
Notation heap := Heap.heap
HClient = fun this to : nat_eqType => this \in clients /\ to == server : nat_eqType -> nat_eqType -> Prop
Notation seq := list
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
find_some : find ?k ?f = Some ?v -> ?k \in dom ?f where ?K : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat prec : nid -> seq nat -> Prop prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (m : seq nat), HClient this to -> prec to m -> msg_from_client {| tag := the_tag; tms_cont := m |} this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet msg : seq nat |- ordType] ?V : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat prec : nid -> seq nat -> Prop prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (m : seq nat), HClient this to -> prec to m ->...-> msg_from_client {| tag := the_tag; tms_cont := m |} this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet msg : seq nat |- UMC.sort ?U]
eqP : reflect (?x = ?y) (?x == ?y) where ?T : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat prec : nid -> seq nat -> Prop prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (m : seq nat), HClient this to -> prec to m -> msg_from_client {| tag := the_tag; tms_cont := m |} this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet msg : seq nat |- eqType] ?x : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat prec : nid -> seq nat -> Prop prec_safe : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (m : seq nat), HClient this to -> prec to m ->...-> msg_from_client {| tag := the_tag; tms_cont := m |} this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet msg : seq nat |- Equality.sort ?T]

server_step_def : forall (the_tag : nat) (prec : server_state -> nid -> seq nat -> Prop) (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), server_send_safe prec this to d msg < -> (exists (b : heapUMC) (pf : server_send_safe prec this to d msg), server_step the_tag pf = Some b)

Record send_trans (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) : Type := SendTrans { t_snd : nat; send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop; s_safe_coh : forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> coh d; s_safe_in : forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m ->...-> (exists (b : heap) (pf : send_safe this to d msg), send_step this to d msg pf = Some b); s_step_coh : Transitions.s_step_coh_t coh t_snd send_step } Arguments Transitions.send_trans [nodes]%function_scope Arguments Transitions.SendTrans [nodes]%function_scope [coh] [t_snd]%nat_scope [send_safe]%function_scope (_ _)%function_scope [send_step] _%function_scope

s_safe_def : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (s : Transitions.send_trans coh) (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), Transitions.send_safe s this to d msg < -> (exists (b : heap) (pf : Transitions.send_safe s this to d msg), Transitions.send_step pf = Some b)
Transitions.s_safe_def : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (s : Transitions.send_trans coh) (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), Transitions.send_safe s this to d msg < -> (exists (b : heap) (pf : Transitions.send_safe s this to d msg), Transitions.send_step pf = Some b)

server_send_trans : forall (the_tag : nat) (prec : server_state -> nid -> seq nat -> Prop), (forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : server_state) (m : seq nat), HServ this to -> prec s to m -> coh_msg {| content := {| tag := the_tag; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |}) -> Transitions.send_trans coh
client_send_safe_in : forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), client_send_safe this to d m -> this \in nodes /\ to \in nodes

server_send_read_response_trans_obligation_1 : forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : server_state) (m : seq nat), HServ this to -> server_send_read_response_prec s to m -> coh_msg {| content := {| tag := read_response_tag; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |}
